thread.title: S.F. dog owners get lessons in scaring away coyotes
thread.title_full: S.F. dog owners get lessons in scaring away coyotes - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jenna Lyons
title: S.F. dog owners get lessons in scaring away coyotes
text:
Photo: NATURES LANTERN-DAVID CRUZ As coyote encounters have become more common in Golden Gate Park in San Francisco wildlife experts are informing the concerned dog owners how best to haze them during an encounter.
As coyote encounters have become more common in Golden Gate Park in...
Armed with regular household items like a can of Red Bull and an umbrella, wildlife experts with Project Coyote informed the concerned dog owners of San Francisco how best to haze coyotes Wednesday night.
